org.jivesoftware.smackx.pubsub.listener

Interface ItemDeleteListener


  • public interface ItemDeleteListener
    Defines the listener for item deletion events from a node.
    See Also:
    Node.addItemDeleteListener(ItemDeleteListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleDeletedItems(ItemDeleteEvent items)
      Called when items are deleted from a node the listener is registered with.
      void handlePurge()
      Called when all items are deleted from a node the listener is registered with.

    • Method Detail

      • handleDeletedItems

        void handleDeletedItems(ItemDeleteEvent items)
        Called when items are deleted from a node the listener is registered with.
        Parameters:
        items - The event with item deletion details

      • handlePurge

        void handlePurge()
        Called when all items are deleted from a node the listener is registered with.
